channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (29 Apr 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Tonya Mork
item.dc:creator: Tonya Mork
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-04-29/#comment-448">Nick Davis</a>.
Thanks, Nick! Some big announcements coming in mid-May.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nick Davis.

Thanks, Nick! Some big announcements coming in mid-May.

item.title: By: Tonya Mork
item.dc:creator: Tonya Mork
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-04-29/#comment-444">Nick Davis</a>.
Hey Kevin,
Whoopsie, for some odd reason, MemberPress appended some wonky characters onto the end of the coupon. I just updated it and all is good.
I sent you an email too. Let me know if there are any issues. I'm here to help.
Cheers, Tonya
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nick Davis.

Hey Kevin,

Whoopsie, for some odd reason, MemberPress appended some wonky characters onto the end of the coupon. I just updated it and all is good.

I sent you an email too. Let me know if there are any issues. I’m here to help.

Cheers, Tonya

item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-04-29/#comment-443">Kevin</a>.
Hey Kevin,
Did you try the code for the Pro membership (this was made clear on the original interview article, but I don't think I made it clear on this one so have amended now) it should work for that.
Please let Tonya or me know if not!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kevin.

Hey Kevin,

Did you try the code for the Pro membership (this was made clear on the original interview article, but I don’t think I made it clear on this one so have amended now) it should work for that.

Please let Tonya or me know if not!

item.title: By: Kevin
item.dc:creator: Kevin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-04-29/#comment-441">Tonya Mork</a>.
Hi Tonya,
I just tried the discount code for a year of Know the Code, but got an Invalid Coupon error. Is there a discount available?
Thanks!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tonya Mork.

Hi Tonya,

I just tried the discount code for a year of Know the Code, but got an Invalid Coupon error. Is there a discount available?

Thanks!

item.title: By: Marcy Diaz
item.dc:creator: Marcy Diaz
item.description:
Congratulations and Happy Birthday, Nick! You've filled the year with all the great GenesisWP things! It's been wonderful to see everyone's amazing work all in one place; very inspiring!
Looking forward to the next great year!
(PS. You made my day! )
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations and Happy Birthday, Nick!
You’ve filled the year with all the great GenesisWP things! It’s been wonderful to see everyone’s amazing work all in one place; very inspiring!

Looking forward to the next great year!

(PS. You made my day! )

item.title: By: Tonya Mork
item.dc:creator: Tonya Mork
item.description:
Happy One Year to GenesisWP Guide! WooHoo! [picture party streamers and horns here]
Keep up the great work, Nick. Looking forward to year two and all that is in store for the awesome Genesis Community.
item.content:encoded:
Happy One Year to GenesisWP Guide! WooHoo! [picture party streamers and horns here]

Keep up the great work, Nick. Looking forward to year two and all that is in store for the awesome Genesis Community.
